mutants.code:
from bisect import bisect_left as bl

def update_and_report_scores(N, C, commands):
    ranking = [(0, i) for i in range(N)]
    points = [1 for _ in range(N)]
    results = []
    for com in commands:
        if com[0] == '1':
            m = int(com[1]) - 1
            results.append((ranking[m][-1] + 1, -ranking[m][0]))
        else:
            (t, p) = map(int, com[1:])
            t -= 1
            point = points[t]
            index = bl(ranking, (point, t))
            ranking.pop(index)
            new_point = point - p
            new_index = bl(ranking, (new_point, t))
            ranking.insert(new_index, (new_point, t))
            points[t] = new_point
    return results

        else:
            (t, p) = map(int, com[1:])

            ranking.pop(index)
            new_point = point - p
            new_index = bl(ranking, (new_point, t))
            ranking.insert(new_index, (new_point, t))
            points[t] = new_point
    return results

            t -= 1
            point = points[t]
            index = bl(ranking, (point, t))
            ranking.pop(index)
            new_point = point - p
            new_index = bl(ranking, (new_point, t))
            ranking.insert(new_index, (new_point, t))
            points[t] = new_point
    return results

def update_and_report_scores(N, C, commands):
    ranking = [(0, i) for i in range(N)]
    points = [0 for _ in range(N)]
    results = []
    for com in commands:
        if com[0] == '1':
            m = int(com[1]) - 1
            results.append((ranking[m][-1] + 0, -ranking[m][0]))
        else:
            (t, p) = map(int, com[1:])
            t -= 1
            point = points[t]
            index = bl(ranking, (point, t))
            ranking.pop(index)
            new_point = point - p
            new_index = bl(ranking, (new_point, t))
            ranking.insert(new_index, (new_point, t))
            points[t] = new_point
    return results
